com.tomtom.speedtools.mongodb

Class DaoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.mongodb.DaoUtils

  • public final class DaoUtils
extends Object
    This class provides generic methods to operate on MongoDB Collections. Most methods are package private to make sure they are only used by DAO's.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • findOne

        @Nonnull
public static <T> T findOne(@Nonnull
                                     com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     MongoDBQuery query)
                              throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                     InternalDaoException
        Finds a single entity that satisfies a specified query filter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the reconstituted object.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection to get the entity from.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to reconstitute the object stored in the collection.
        query - The query to select the entity.
        Returns:
        The object in the collection for the given query.
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - Thrown if no object if found with the given id. This will NOT log an error.
        InternalDaoException - Thrown when an unknown error has occurred. The error will have been logged.

      • find

        @Nonnull
public static <T> List<T> find(@Nonnull
                                        com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        MongoDBQuery query)
                                 throws InternalDaoException
        Finds entities that satisfy a specified query filter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the reconstituted object.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection to get the entity from.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to reconstitute the object stored in the collection.
        query - The query to select the entity.
        Returns:
        The objects in the collection for the given query.
        Throws:
        InternalDaoException - Thrown when an unknown error has occurred. The error will have been logged.

      • find

        @Nonnull
public static <T> List<T> find(@Nonnull
                                        com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                        boolean ignoreMapperErrors,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        MongoDBQuery query)
                                 throws InternalDaoException
        Finds entities that satisfy a specified query filter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Element type.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection to get the entity from.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to reconstitute the object stored in the collection.
        ignoreMapperErrors - Ignore mapping exception, skip entities with mapping errors.
        query - The query to select the entity.
        Returns:
        The objects in the collection for the given query.
        Throws:
        InternalDaoException - Thrown when an unknown error has occurred. The error will have been logged.

      • find

        @Nonnull
public static <T> List<T> find(@Nonnull
                                        com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                        boolean ignoreMapperErrors,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        MongoDBQuery query,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        MongoDBSorting sorting,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        MongoDBPaging paging)
                                 throws InternalDaoException
        Finds entities that satisfy a specified query filter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Element type.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection to get the entity from.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to reconstitute the object stored in the collection.
        ignoreMapperErrors - Ignore mapping exception, skip entities with mapping errors.
        query - The query to select the entity.
        sorting - The sorting parameters for this query.
        paging - The paging parameters for this query.
        Returns:
        The objects in the collection for the given query.
        Throws:
        InternalDaoException - Thrown when an unknown error has occurred. The error will have been logged.

      • storeEntity

        public static <T> void storeEntity(@Nonnull
                                   com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   T entity)
                            throws EntityStoreException
        Store the given object in the given collections.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to te stored.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection in which to store the object.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to transform the object.
        entity - The object to be stored.
        Throws:
        EntityStoreException - Thrown if the object cannot be transformed. The error will have been logged.

      • removeEntity

        public static <T> void removeEntity(@Nonnull
                                    com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    EntityMapper<T> mapper,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    T entity)
                             throws EntityRemoveException
        Removes the given object from the given collection. The entity must fully match the database record to be removed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to remove.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection from which to remove the object.
        mapper - Mapper to be used to transform the object.
        entity - The object to be removed.
        Throws:
        EntityRemoveException - Thrown if the object cannot be removed. The error will have been logged.

      • removeEntityByField

        public static <T> void removeEntityByField(@Nonnull
                                           com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           EntityMapper.Field<T> field,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           T value)
                                    throws EntityRemoveException
        Removes the given object from the given collection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Element type.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection from which to remove the object.
        field - The field to match.
        value - The value of the field.
        Throws:
        EntityRemoveException - Thrown if the object cannot be removed. The error will have been logged.

      • update

        public static void update(@Nonnull
                          com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                          @Nonnull
                          MongoDBQuery query,
                          @Nonnull
                          MongoDBUpdate update)
                   throws EntityStoreException,
                          EntityNotFoundException
        Update a document in a collection. This will always update the last modified time as well.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection that contains the document.
        query - Query to find the document.
        update - Update for document.
        Throws:
        EntityStoreException - New document cannot be stored. The error will have been logged.
        EntityNotFoundException - The document was not found. The error will have been logged.

      • update

        public static void update(@Nonnull
                          com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                          @Nonnull
                          MongoDBQuery query,
                          @Nonnull
                          MongoDBUpdate update,
                          boolean updateLastModified)
                   throws EntityStoreException,
                          EntityNotFoundException
        Update a document in a collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection that contains the document.
        query - Query to find the document.
        update - Update for document.
        updateLastModified - True if the last modified time needs to be adjusted as well (to now).
        Throws:
        EntityStoreException - New document cannot be stored. The error will have been logged.
        EntityNotFoundException - The document was not found. The error will have been logged.

      • count

        public static long count(@Nonnull
                         com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                         @Nonnull
                         MongoDBQuery query)
                  throws InternalDaoException
        Returns number of entities that satisfy a specified query filter. When the collections is large and indexes are missing this call can be a performance killer.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection to get the entity from.
        query - The query to select the entity.
        Returns:
        The number of objects in the collection for the given query.
        Throws:
        InternalDaoException - Thrown when an unknown error has occurred. The error will have been logged.

      • upsert

        public static void upsert(@Nonnull
                          com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                          @Nonnull
                          MongoDBQuery query,
                          @Nonnull
                          com.mongodb.DBObject value)
                   throws EntityStoreException
        Update or insert a document in a collection. This will always update the last modified time as well.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection that contains the document.
        query - Query to find the document.
        value - Update for document.
        Throws:
        EntityStoreException - New document cannot be stored. The error will have been logged.

      • upsert

        public static int upsert(@Nonnull
                         com.mongodb.DBCollection collection,
                         @Nonnull
                         MongoDBQuery query,
                         @Nonnull
                         com.mongodb.DBObject value,
                         boolean updateLastModified)
                  throws EntityStoreException
        Update or insert a document in a collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - Collection that contains the document.
        query - Query to find the document.
        value - Update (or initial value) for document.
        updateLastModified - True if the last modified time needs to be adjusted as well (to now).
        Returns:
        Number of records updated (0 if inserted, 1 if updated).
        Throws:
        EntityStoreException - New document cannot be stored. The error will have been logged.

      • getWriteConcern

        @Nonnull
public static com.mongodb.WriteConcern getWriteConcern()
        This retrieves the global write concern of the DAO utils for save() and update() calls.
        Returns:
        Global write concern.

      • setWriteConcern

        public static void setWriteConcern(@Nonnull
                                   com.mongodb.WriteConcern newWriteConcern)
        This sets the global write concern of the DAO utils for save() and update() calls.
        Parameters:
        newWriteConcern - Write concern.
